age_specific_warnings: Anticoagulant warfarin requires frequent monitoring due to increased bleeding risk in elderly
Sedating antihistamine diphenhydramine may cause confusion and falls
Benzodiazepine lorazepam increases risk of cognitive impairment and hip fractures
Return Data.dosing_considerations: Consider reduced starting doses for warfarin and metformin due to potential decreased renal function. Avoid diphenhydramine and lorazepam per Beers Criteria. Monitor closely for orthostatic hypotension with lisinopril.
